questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Urban cityscape
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) From a high vantage point in a city
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A busy urban environment
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A river
B) Skyscrapers
C) A park
D) A mountain

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A park
B) A tall black skyscraper
C) A river
D) A bridge

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A beach
B) A tall building
C) A road
D) A garden

What is the color of the central skyscraper in the photo?
A) White
B) Black
C) Red
D) Yellow

What type of area is depicted in the photo?
A) Rural
B) Suburban
C) Urban
D) Coastal

What can be seen in the lower part of the photo?
A) A river
B) A road with traffic
C) A forest
D) A beach

What is the color of the sky in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Grey
C) Orange
D) Pink

What is the visibility like in the photo?
A) Clear
B) Hazy
C) Very clear
D) Blurry

What type of transport is likely visible in the photo?
A) Boats
B) Cars and boats
C) Bicycles
D) Airplanes

What can be inferred about the location of the photo?
A) It is in a rural area
B) It is in a suburban area
C) It is in a major city
D) It is in a small town

What is the photo's perspective?
A) Ground level
B) Aerial view
C) Underwater
D) Eye level

What is the state of traffic in the photo?
A) Heavy
B) Light
C) No traffic
D) Moderate

What is the position of the river in relation to the buildings?
A) In front
B) Behind
C) To the left
D) To the right

What can be seen on the left side of the photo?
A) Open fields
B) More buildings
C) A large park
D) A beach

What type of buildings are mostly seen in the photo?
A) Residential houses
B) Skyscrapers and office buildings
C) Shopping malls
D) Historical monuments

What is the color of the tallest building in the center?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black
D) White

Are there any signs of greenery in the photo?
A) Yes, a lot
B) Yes, a little
C) No
D) Only trees

What is the shape of the building in the foreground?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Triangular
D) Irregular

Is there any water body visible in the photo?
A) Yes, a lake
B) Yes, a river
C) No
D) Yes, an ocean

Which side of the photo has taller buildings?
A) Left
B) Right
C) Center
D) Both sides equally
